QuestData.Title: You'll Need a Gryphon
QuestData.Description: What could be more fitting than to take one of their own gryphons to use against them? Go to Onslaught Harbor and take the reins to one of their gryphons from the dead clutches of its rider.$B$BReturn with the gryphon, delivering it to Uzo Deathcaller. He will see to its proper transformation and provide you with further instructions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver an Onslaught Gryphon to Uzo Deathcaller at Death's Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: What took so long? Are their gryphons slow? We'll have to do something about that.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh yeah this is gonna be good!$B$BStand back... I'm gonna call down the wrath of the blood ritual!

Objectives.Objective: Onslaught Gryphon delivered to Uzo Deathcaller
